description: This table contains hospital account events information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of a hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number in the results of a query. Since multiple procedure events can be stored in a hospital account, each event will have a unique line number.

columns.name: EVENT_PROV_ID
columns.description: The ID number of an event provider stored in a hospital account.

columns.name: EVENT_DATE
columns.description: The procedure event date stored in a hospital account.

columns.name: EVENT_COMMENT
columns.description: A comment associated with a procedure event stored in a hospital account.

columns.name: ASA_CLASS
columns.description: An American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) class (numeric) associated with a procedure event stored in a hospital account.

columns.name: ANESTH_TYPE_HA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The anesthesia type associated with a procedure event stored in a hospital account.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


General


Local


Regional


Epidural


None


Spinal


IV Sedation


Topical


Other

columns.name: ANESTH_PROV_ID
columns.description: The ID number of an anesthesia provider associated with a procedure event stored in a hospital account.
